BiwaScheme consists of these files.

|_.directory |_.file |_.description |_.depends on |
| (top)  | hello_world.html | sample application | lib/biwascheme.js |
|           | repl.html | REPL | src/*.js |
| demo | *.html | sample programs | lib/biwascheme.js |
| lib       | biwascheme.js | src/*.js packed and compressed | |
| src     | prototype.js | http://prototypejs.org | |
|           | stackbase.js | interpreter main | prototype.js|
|           | system/*.js | parts of the interpreter | stackbase.js |
|           | library/infra.js | infrastructure of library functions | stackbase.js |
|           | library/r6rs_lib.js | library (R6RS base, R6RS library) | stackbase.js, infra.js |
|           | library/webscheme_lib.js | library (which needs browser) | stackbase.js, infra.js |
|           | library/srfi.js | library (SRFIs) | stackbase.js, infra..js |
|           | library/extra_lib.js | library (functions ported from Gauche, etc.) | stackbase.js, infra..js |
|           | dumper.js | debug (test/browser.html and test/tracer.html needs this) | stackbase.js |
|           | io.js | experimental. "io.js":http://kb.mozillazine.org/Dev_:_Extensions_:_Example_Code_:_File_IO_:_jsio | |
| test    | spec.html | see [[UnitTest]] | (lib/biwascheme.js or src/*.js) and test/unit.js |
|           | unit.js | body of unit test  |  |
|           | tracer.html  | tiny debugger of BiwaScheme itself  | src/*.js |

h1. Development sources and Release builds

BiwaScheme is made of many files (src/*.js), but they are concatenated and compressed into one file, lib/biwascheme.js.

* Development tools (repl.html, test/tracer.html) loads src/.
* Applications (hello_world.html, demo/*.html) loads lib/.
* The unit test can load both src/ and lib/ (see [[UnitTest]] to how to specify it).

h2. How to build lib/biwascheme.js

You need make and Java installed.

(1) Download and unpack "YUI compressor":http://yuilibrary.com/downloads/#yuicompressor

(2) Create a shell script 'yuicomp' like:
<pre><code>#!/bin/sh
java -jar /somewhere/yuicompressor-2.4.2/build/yuicompressor-2.4.2.jar $*</code></pre>

(3) make

h2. How to add a new file

When adding a new file under src/system/ or src/library, you need to edit both:
* src/development_loader.js
* Makefile
